title: $1 QuickPick ordinary ticket bags $6.2 million Toto Reunion Draw
desc: One lucky share hit the jackpot in Friday's (Feb 13) Toto Reunion Draw with a windfall of $6,188,268. The sole winning share is a QuickPick ordinary entry ticket, which costs $1, and was purchased at a FairPrice outlet in NEX.The outlet is among the top five outlets with the most Group 1 and Group 2 winning frequency since October 2014....

title: Quantum Sensor Detects Ultra-Low Levels of Cancer Biomarkers in Blood
desc: Light sensors made of DNA, CRISPR, and quantum dots can detect extremely low concentrations of lung cancer biomarkers.

title: Two Vast ‘Blobs’ of Hot Rock Have Stabilized Earth’s Magnetic Field for Hundreds of Millions of Years
desc: A steady magnetic field protects Earth's surface, and all those living on it, from harmful radiation.

title: Man sentenced to death for ex-girlfriend’s murder at KK mall
desc: Justice Alexander Siew rejects the defence’s argument that it was a crime of passion after noting that the accused bought the knife used to stab the victim the day before.

title: Google Revives Android 17 Beta 1 Just Days After Halting Launch
desc: Android 17 Canary will feature improvements to the camera, networking and security, the company says.

title: Hull City 0-4 Chelsea: Fan group condemns homophobic chanting as 'stain on game' after arrests made
desc: Arrests have been made following incidents of alleged discriminatory chanting during the FA Cup fourth round match between Hull City and Chelsea.

title: Major opportunities for AI in jobs and governance, says MeitY Secretary S. Krishnan
desc: India's AI opportunities in jobs and governance, focusing on infrastructure, reskilling, and international cooperation ahead of the AI Impact Summit.

title: Exclusive: Key US infectious-diseases centre to drop pandemic preparation
desc: Staff members have been instructed to scrub this topic and ‘biodefense’ from the agency’s website.

title: How a Law Graduate Earned a First Class Degree at 20
desc: Discover the journey of a first-class law graduate who broke a 25-year record. Learn her mindset, discipline, and sacrifices for academic excellence.

title: Woman arrested for Nigerian driver killed in South Africa
desc: South African police have arrested a female suspect linked to the hijacking and murder of a 22-year-old Nigerian driver killed in Pretoria West.
